data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book chapter Dong, Zhiming (1979): Dinosaurs from the Cretaceous of South China. In: Mesozoic and Cenozoic Red Beds of South China: Selected Papers from the " Cretaceous-Tertiary Workshop ", Institute of Vertebrate Paleontology and Paleoanthropology & Nanjing Institute of Paleontology. Nanxiong, China: Science Press: 342-350, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.162178|3 occurrences
